=== About Me ===
I am a fan of all things GNU/Linux, especially Ubuntu.  I have used some form of a Linux distribution since about 1998, moving to Ubuntu in 2007 with Ubuntu 7.04 (Feisty).  The last time I used a non-free operating on my home computer was probably 2001 or 2002.

Besides things Open Source, I enjoy Basketball (Go Cavs! We donâ€™t need Lebron!), Psychology, Physics, and Eastern Philosophy. I also enjoy nature, fishing, camping and anything else outdoors.

=== Contributions Thus Far ===
* Attend Local Global Jams last 4 release cycles.
* Bug reporting and triaging.

=== Goals for the Future ===
* Become more active in the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OhioTeam|Ubuntu Ohio Loco]]</nowiki>.
* Become more active in <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/|Ubuntu Forums]]</nowiki>.
* Learn how to contribute better bug reports and become a member of the BugSquad.
* Contribute to the Documentation Team.
* Earn Ubuntu Membership.
